pages.text: As you learn about new materials, so must you invent new ways to produce better tools. Craft a $(item)stencil table$(), a $(item)pattern chest$(), a $(item)part builder$() and a $(item)tool station$(). Place them down somewhere.

pages.name: Tables
pages.text: If you place them next to each other, you can swap the menus more easily.

Get some blank patterns and using the stencil table, make a pickaxe head pattern. Using this pattern make a wooden pickkaxe head on the part builder. Also create a wooden binding and a wooden tool rod in the same way.
